request.desc: Request going into Fullscreen (with optional target)

target.desc: Optional CSS selector of target to request Fullscreen on

returns.desc: A Promise with the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)

exit.desc: Request exiting out of Fullscreen mode

returns.desc: A Promise with the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)

toggle.desc: Request toggling Fullscreen mode (with optional target if requesting going into Fullscreen only)

target.desc: Optional CSS selector of target to request Fullscreen on

returns.desc: A Promise with the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)
